title: [FEATURE] Update Docs to version 3
body:
### Is your feature request related to a problem?

On Microsoft Site you only get the docs to Version 2.xxx

### Describe the solution you would like

Docs for V3.xxx are needed

### Describe alternatives you have considered

none

### Additional context

_No response_

### Code of Conduct

- [x] I agree to follow this project's Code of Conduct

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: Thanks for letting us know. There was an issue that has now been fixed. And we have also added complete docs for all apis.
